title: Khp 1  Saraṇagamana | Going for Refuge
summary: Khp 1  Saraṇagamana | Going for Refuge  —  The standard passage for taking refuge.

title: Khp 2  Dasa Sikkhāpada | The Ten Training Rules
summary: Khp 2  Dasa Sikkhāpada | The Ten Training Rules  —  The novice’s training rules.

title: Khp 3  Dvattiṁsākāra | The 32 Parts
summary: Khp 3  Dvattiṁsākāra | The 32 Parts  —  The list of body parts that is used in contemplating the body to overcome lust or pride.

title: Khp 4  Sāmaṇera Pañhā | The Novice’s Questions
summary: Khp 4  Sāmaṇera Pañhā | The Novice’s Questions  —  A short catechism of basic Buddhist concepts.

title: Khp 5  Maṅgala Sutta | Protection
summary: Khp 5  Maṅgala Sutta | Protection  —  A list of the types of skillful behavior that give blessings and protection.

title: Khp 6  Ratana Sutta | Treasures
summary: Khp 6  Ratana Sutta | Treasures  —  The many treasures to be found in the Triple Gem.

title: Khp 7  Tirokuḍḍa Kaṇḍa | (Hungry Ghosts) Outside the Walls
summary: Khp 7  Tirokuḍḍa Kaṇḍa | (Hungry Ghosts) Outside the Walls  —  The conditions under which hungry ghosts live, and a blessing for dedicating merit to them.

title: Khp 8  Nidhi Kaṇḍa | The Reserve Fund
summary: Khp 8  Nidhi Kaṇḍa | The Reserve Fund  —  Where is the safest and most productive place to stash your wealth?

title: Khp 9  Karaṇīya Mettā Sutta | Goodwill
summary: Khp 9  Karaṇīya Mettā Sutta | Goodwill  —  The practice of developing universal goodwill: the practices that form a foundation for the practice, the attitude of universal goodwill itself, and the steps that lead from goodwill to awakening.
